sentences.sContent: A lot of small children are fussy eaters (= they dislike many types of food ) .
‘Do you want to go out or just rent a movie?’ ‘I’m not fussy’ (= I don’t mind ) .
sentences.sCn: “你想出去还是租影碟来看？”“随便。”

synos.tran: 爱挑剔的，难取悦的；易烦恼的

words.tran: 大惊小怪，大惊小怪的人；小题大作；忙乱
小题大作；忙乱；焦燥；焦急；无事自扰

trans.tranCn: 爱挑剔的， 难取悦的
trans.tranOther: very concerned about small, usually unimportant details, and difficult to please
